name: Guardian's Deflection (Swashbuckler)
summary: You use your weapon to deflect the attack against your ally, granting a +2 circumstance bonus to their AC against the triggering attack.
description: You use your weapon to deflect the attack against your ally, granting a +2 circumstance bonus to their AC against the triggering attack. This turns the triggering critical hit into a hit, or the triggering hit into a miss.
trigger: An ally within your melee reach is hit by an attack, you can see the attacker, and a +2 circumstance bonus to AC would turn the critical hit into a hit or the hit into a miss.
